Nadával na FIFU a potom opľul šál s logom EA. Profesionálny hráč za to dostal ban, spoločnosti došla trpezlivosť
06 Nov 2019, 06:55 by Vladimír Mičuda

Správal sa ako hulvát a spoločnosť EA to už nemienila tolerovať.

Hry sú fenoménom 21. storočia a okrem toho, že nimi zabíjame voľný čas, hitom sa stalo aj ich pozeranie. V najpopulárnejších hrách sveta sa konajú turnaje dotované obrovskými peniazmi, z e-sportu sa stal nepochybne životný štýl. V minulosti bolo trápne povedať nahlas, že hráš či sleduješ hry, no dnes je komunita okolo hier taká masívna, že sa čoraz častejšie hovorí dokonca o zaradení niektorých hier medzi olympijské športy.



Niektoré ale obsahujú násilie, a to je najväčší problém. To sa ale netýka športových hier, napríklad taká FIFA by možno aj spĺňala atribúty na to, aby sa dostala na olympiádu. S určitosťou sa na ňu ale nedostane streamer Kurt0411, ktorý v hre dostal ban. Dôvod je jednoduchý, správal sa ako hulvát.



Pravidelne kritizoval vo svojich videách vydavateľa a vývojárov hry. Na tom by nebolo nič zlé, ak by to robil s mierou a opodstatnene. Profesionálny hráč FIFA bol ale často vulgárny a EA ho neraz upozorňovala, aby krotil svoje vášne. Dokonca mu zakázali zúčastniť sa niektorých kvalifikácií.
Poslednou kvapkou bol jeho výlev na platforme Twitch počas streamovania zápasu. Kurt prehrával a v samom závere zápasu sa mu podarilo vyrovnať. „F*ck you EA,“ zakričal a následne zdvihol svoj šál s logom EA. A viackrát ho opľul. Na jeho správanie upozornil FIFA streamer DrJarb a vznikla medzi nimi na internete potýčka. Celý beef nakoniec ukončil samotný vývojár hry a udelil Kurtovi ban.



EA


Podľa nás zaslúžený. Kurt, keďže je profesionál, by sa mal správať zodpovedne. Navyše, EA ho v podstate istým spôsobom „zamestnáva“ a jeho nevhodné správanie hádže zlé svetlo aj na spoločnosť. O EA si môžeme myslieť čo chceme, no mali by sme to vedieť povedať slušne. A Kurt to očividne nevie.
EA ban odôvodňuje tým, že hráča už niekoľkokrát upozorňovala, tentokrát zašiel priďaleko. Mnohí sa postavili na stranu spoločnosti, iní sú zas presvedčení, že Kurt dostal až príliš tvrdý trest. My sme rozhodne na strane vývojára, čo ty? Jeho reakciu si môžeš pozrieť na videu.




ĎALŠIE ČLÁNKY, KTORÉ BY ŤA MOHLI ZAUJÍMAŤ
text:
He swore at FIFU and then spilled the shawl with the EA logo. A professional player got a ban for it, the company ran out of patience
06 Nov 2019, 06:55 by Vladimir Micuda

He was acting like a cad and EA was no longer tolerating it.

Games are a phenomenon of the 21st century, and besides killing their free time, they have also been seen. In the world's most popular games, huge money tournaments take place, and e-sport has undoubtedly become a lifestyle. In the past, it has been embarrassing to say aloud that you are playing or watching games, but today the gaming community is so massive that it is increasingly being said to include some games among the Olympic sports.



But some contain violence, and that is the biggest problem. However, this does not apply to sports games, for example, such a FIFA might also fulfill the attributes to reach the Olympics. But it will certainly not get the Kurt0411 streamer, who got a ban in the game. The reason is simple, he behaved like a cad.



He regularly criticized the video's publishers and game developers. There would be nothing wrong with doing it in moderation and justifiably. But a professional FIFA player was often vulgar and EA often warned him to curb his passions. They even forbade him to attend some qualifications.
The last drop was his outflow on the Twitch platform during the streaming match. Kurt was losing and at the very end of the match he managed to equalize. "F * ck you EA," he shouted, then lifted his scarf with the EA logo. And he spilled him several times. His behavior was pointed out by the FIFA streamer DrJarb and there was a skirmish between them. The whole beef eventually ended the game developer himself and awarded Kurt a ban.



EA


We deserve it. Kurt, being a professional, should behave responsibly. In addition, EA basically "employs" him in a certain way, and his inappropriate behavior throws bad light on society. We can think of EA what we want, but we should be able to say it well. And Kurt obviously doesn't know.
EA ban justifies the fact that he has warned the player several times, this time he went too far. Many have taken the side of society, others are convinced that Kurt has been overly punished. We're definitely on the developer side, what about you? You can watch his reaction in the video.
